question: After being involved in an accident, you were looked after by a person you did not know before. Write a special thank you letter to express your gratitude.In your letter:Introduce yourself and let him/her know why you are writingExpress your appreciationAnd offer him/ her to visit your home with this family.
text: I am writing this letter to say thank you for taking care of me when I was in trouble and I needed someone to help me.

I am Hafiz Mahmood , working as a project manager in a software company. II would like to say thanks for your help when I was injured in a road accident and I was senseless and  nobody was there. Fortunately, you as a kind person saw me  and took me to your home and treated me like your family member.

Honestly speaking, I cannot express my feelings and respect for you. I was an unknown person to you at that time but you showed your humanity. However, my belief that humanity is bigger than every relation is strong as compared to previous experiences.
In the end, I and my wife want to give  dinner to you and your family. I know it doesn't enough to fulfil your kindness but we just want to give this honour to you.
I am looking forward  positive response from  you.
